headline: Micron Technology (NasdaqGS:MU) Sees 11% Price Drop Over The Last Week
summary: Micron Technology (NasdaqGS:MU) recently announced no share repurchases in a recent tranche of its buyback program, although it declared a cash dividend earlier. Despite launching innovative memory products for AI servers and collaborating with NVIDIA, Micron's stock price fell by 11% last week. This followed a challenging period for technology stocks, with chip sector concerns heightened by U.S. export restrictions to China impacting the broader market. With the Nasdaq gaining slightly...
